title: Fed Bent the Rules in Rollout of Instant Payment Service FedNow, Says Custodia CEO
description: Long pointed to public documents showing Adyen, a FedNow early adopter, got a federal master account in July 2020—a year before it had a U.S. branch.

title: Op-ed: Benchmarking ChatGPT’s capabilities against alternatives including Anthropic’s Claude 2, Google’s Bard, and Meta’s Llama2
description:
As previously reported, new research reveals inconsistencies in ChatGPT models over time. A Stanford and UC Berkeley study analyzed March and June versions of GPT-3.5 and GPT-4 on diverse tasks. The results show significant drifts in performance, even over just a few months. For example, GPT-4’s prime number accuracy plunged from 97.6% to 2.4% between […]

The post Op-ed: Benchmarking ChatGPT’s capabilities against alternatives including Anthropic’s Claude 2, Google’s Bard, and Meta’s Llama2 appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Terraform Labs Appoints New CEO While Co-Founder Remains in Jail
